-Nrzx5ud85w_OB8cE57W.definition: A container for storing data values, identified by a unique name. Variables can hold different types of values such as numbers, strings, or objects.
-Nrzx5ud85w_OB8cE57W.title: Variable

-Nrzx5ud85w_OB8cE57X.definition: An individual component or part of an HTML document, such as headings, paragraphs, images, and links. HTML elements are represented by tags and form the building blocks of web pages.
-Nrzx5ud85w_OB8cE57X.title: Element

-Nrzx5uejex26C_rflOD.definition: A pattern used to select and style elements in an HTML document. Selectors can target elements based on their tag name, class, ID, attributes, or relationship with other elements.
-Nrzx5uejex26C_rflOD.title: Selector

-Nrzx5uejex26C_rflOE.definition: A block of code that performs a specific task. Functions allow you to encapsulate reusable code and execute it by calling the function with specific parameters.
-Nrzx5uejex26C_rflOE.title: function

-Nrzx5uejex26C_rflOF.definition: A property that provides additional information about an HTML element. Attributes are defined within the opening tag of an element and are used to modify its behavior or appearance.
-Nrzx5uejex26C_rflOF.title: Attribute

-Nrzx5ufw9WQI4z9Xz_V.definition: A set of style rules that can be applied to multiple HTML elements. Classes allow you to group related styling properties and apply them to elements selectively.
-Nrzx5ufw9WQI4z9Xz_V.title: class

-Nrzx5ugG8Ju_g1IVAKg.definition: A data structure that stores a collection of elements, each identified by an index. Arrays can hold values of multiple data types and are mutable, meaning their elements can be changed.
-Nrzx5ugG8Ju_g1IVAKg.title: Array

-Nrzx5uhIKxvdtPb_uCg.definition: A keyword or code snippet that defines an HTML element. Tags are enclosed in angle brackets (< >) and specify the structure and content of web pages.
-Nrzx5uhIKxvdtPb_uCg.title: tag

-Nrzx5uinz49uL7deY1H.definition: An aspect of an element's style that can be modified using CSS. Properties define characteristics such as color, size, font, spacing, and positioning of HTML elements.
-Nrzx5uinz49uL7deY1H.title: property

-Nrzx5ujPtMjj3bmzkZP.definition: An action or occurrence that takes place in the browser, such as a mouse click, keyboard input, or page load. JavaScript can respond to events by executing specified code, allowing for dynamic and interactive web pages.
-Nrzx5ujPtMjj3bmzkZP.title: Event
